Assemblies.description: Root object containing a collection of genomic assembly definitions for the BRC Analytics platform.

assemblies.description: Collection of genomic assembly entries that will be available for analysis in the BRC Analytics platform.

Assemblies.title: Assemblies

Assembly.description: Definition of a genomic assembly with its unique identifier.

accession.description: The unique accession identifier for the assembly (e.g., GCA_000001405.28 for GRCh38), used to retrieve the assembly data from public repositories.
